title: Sensitivity of twenty-first-century global-mean steric sea level rise to ocean model formulation
contributionStatement: Conducted the GFDL Earth System Model version "2G" (GFDL-ESM2G) simulations used in this study and assisted in interpreting the differences in sea level in this model across different climate warming scenarios. (D=50\% / A=10\% / I=10\% / W=5\%)
